title: Approximate Nearest Neighbors in TSNE
description: In this lab, we will learn how to use approximate nearest neighbors in TSNE using Python's scikit-learn library.

meta.keywords: approximate nearest neighbors, TSNE, Python, scikit-learn, Jupyter Notebook
